response.overview: Eli is a young teenager who suffers with school work, anxiety and discovering who he is. But when his grandma passes away, the one person he could truly talk to, his world begins to unravel. Friendships are unclear, his family is in a recovering mess, the future in his hands, and the looming threat of loneliness seems too real. As his thirst for a happier life in a more nostalgic time grows, the line between reality and fiction blurs. Eli’s memories will either be the death of him or his answer to the life he’s always wanted, but the emotions he’s feeling are more complicated than ever. Friends and family can do what they can, but this is between Eli and himself, and that can change everything. Will he live in his nostalgic prison to keep himself happy, or is there more to life than what he sees…
response.title: Halcyon
